Method Summary
 void doTurn()
          Will pass the ship list and action results list in a call to the client players doTurn method Kill the connection if a call to the doTurn method fails

Constructor Detail

ServerConnection

public ServerConnection(int port,
                        java.lang.String ip,
                        java.lang.String name,
                        ClientPlayer bot)
Constructor that creates a client socket and request and set the name of the ClientPlayer. The server connection will then call the run method

Parameters:
port - The port to connect to the server
ip - The ip address of the server
name - The name to identify the player
bot - the bot
Method Detail

kill

public void kill()
Ends the socket connection.

See Also:
ServerConnection

run

public void run()
Goes into an infinite loop waiting for server to give command. Each command puts ServerConnection into a different state.

setupHandShake

public void setupHandShake()
Setup hand shake. Confirms that server and client versions are compatible.

setCredentials

public void setCredentials(java.lang.String name)
Sets the credentials.

Parameters:
name - the name of the player

placeShips

public void placeShips()
Passes a list of ships to the player with a call to the client players placeShips method

doTurn

public void doTurn()
Will pass the ship list and action results list in a call to the client players doTurn method Kill the connection if a call to the doTurn method fails
